CustomDataType.description: This class does not get 'AdditionalProperties = false' in the schema generation, so it can be extended with arbitrary JSON properties to allow adding custom data.

BootReasonEnumType.description: This contains the reason for sending this message to the CSMS.

The physical system where an Electrical Vehicle (EV) can be charged.

Device. Model. CI20_ Text

Defines the model of the device.

vendorName.description: Identifies the vendor (not necessarily in a unique manner).

firmwareVersion.description: This contains the firmware version of the Charging Station.
